attributes.action: empower the Speaker to ensure the Prime Minister does not avoid giving proper answers to all PMQs .
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Members of parliament have just 30 minutes a week to publicly question the Prime Minister. I propose the Speaker be given powers to REQUIRE the PM to answer questions directly and to refain from avoiding giving such answers by the use of diversionary or avoidance tactics of any sort.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
